pages.text: Insatiable Voracity grants the Maw a hunger that knows no bounds. With every life it extinguishes, the beast absorbs a fraction of its victim's power, honing its edge and increasing the damage dealt with each subsequent kill.
With each ascension to a higher Stage, damage granted by the essence of the fallen ones increases.

Instability (Unsatisfiable): The beast's hunger is a maddening force. In fits of blind starvation, the Maw may lose all distinction between prey and master, unexpectedly turning back to sink its teeth into your own flesh.
